title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Right now Biden rules the world So it's up to Biden to end war so he need to decide If he replace Putin with someone who Biden administratsioon prefers or Biden might not replace Putin just adding more sanctions for russia.Do you think Biden Will replace Putin ?

comments.author: Gyfts
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 12, 2022, 01:29:47 PMRight now Biden rules the worldSupreme leader Joe BidenÂ  Regime changes never go smoothly. Putin has maybe <10 years before he dies of old age or until someone within his own regime poisons him so it isn't necessary for anyone to meddle in Russia's own demise. If they take drastic war action that significantly effects global interests then maybe the analysis changes. Until then, there needs be no action.

comments.author: suchmoon
comments.body: Biden - president of Russia, makes sense. No big deal if he doesn't speak Russian, gibberish in any language is still gibberish.

comments.author: gantez
comments.body: How do you think that is possible. Putin is Russian President and a sovereign country that is not in America or control by it. Biden can have the interest or wish to do that to remove Putin but is not in the power of US president to remove russian president. The countries that have sovereignty have power of independence.

comments.author: cmg777
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 12, 2022, 01:29:47 PMRight now Biden rules the world So it's up to Biden to end war so he need to decide If he replace Putin with someone who Biden administratsioon prefers or Biden might not replace Putin just adding more sanctions for russia.Do you think Biden Will replace Putin ?No no no, its Klaus Schwab and the WEF along with the Davos/Bilderberg elites that run Russia and this world. Leaders are just a distraction and myth that they will do anything for you. The only difference is the perception that one leader will make your life worse slower than the other is the greater truth.Quote from: suchmoon on December 12, 2022, 04:08:36 PMBiden - president of Russia, makes sense. No big deal if he doesn't speak Russian, gibberish in any language is still gibberish. Never thought I'd see the day that you'd finally bash him. I think he should be a permanent cast member of SNL to play himself or any wacky character they come up with. He'd be funnier than all the rest of them minus the groping of female and even male cast members especially if there are children involved.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 12, 2022, 01:29:47 PMRight now Biden rules the world So it's up to Biden to end war so he need to decide If he replace Putin with someone who Biden administratsioon prefers or Biden might not replace Putin just adding more sanctions for russia.Do you think Biden Will replace Putin ?If Biden had the power to end the war in Ukraine, he would have done that long time ago. The US and her allies are careful because Russia and her allies are also powerful. They can only give Ukraine financial and military assistance lack the will power to join the war. One of the potent force of hurting Russia is sanctions and more of these punishments are still coming. The only people that have the power to remove Putin are his people. Russia is a democratic government and it would take a constitutional process to impeach or remove the president of Russia. And from all indication currently, it seems that Putin has the backing of the legislatures who represent the people. Biden wouldn't replace Putin except he becomes a Russian citizen.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Only place he rules is the bedroom.ðŸ¤£

comments.author: BADecker
comments.created_time: December 13, 2022, 05:39:25 PMLast edit: December 14, 2022, 05:53:51 PM by BADecker
comments.body: Will the Biden replace Putin or just keep put more sanctions on russia ?But the REAL question is, "Will SCOTUS replace Biden?" See https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5334747.msg61407639#msg61407639 and the surrounding, several posts, to see that there is a lawsuit before the Supreme Court that gives the SCOTUS the exact power to do this.
